description: Comprehensive course covering basic arithmetic, fractions, decimals, and introduction to geometry.
detailedDescription: This course provides a solid foundation in arithmetic, including the use of fractions and decimals, while introducing basic geometric concepts.

description: Advanced course building on Mathematics 6, focusing on integers, ratios, proportions, and basic algebra concepts.
detailedDescription: Students will explore integers, ratios, and proportions, and begin their journey into basic algebraic concepts and operations.

description: A gifted and talented course that prepares students for high school algebra with a focus on advanced topics in mathematics.
detailedDescription: This course provides students with a deeper understanding of algebraic concepts and prepares them for future advanced math courses.

description: Exploration of functions, geometry, and statistics.
detailedDescription: This course focuses on the study of functions and their applications, along with an introduction to geometric principles and basic statistics.

description: Introduction to algebra, focusing on solving equations and graphing linear functions.
detailedDescription: Students will learn the foundational concepts of algebra, including solving equations and graphing linear functions on a coordinate plane.

description: Study of shapes, sizes, and properties of space, with a focus on geometric principles and proofs.
detailedDescription: This course covers essential geometric concepts, including the properties of shapes, theorems, and proofs.
